ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}], "benefitTypes": {"id": 1, "value": "cash", "label": "Cash"}, "benefits": [{"type": "ul_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Under the scheme, such SC / ST patients will be given a one-time, fixed financial assistance of Rs. 50,000/- (Rupees Fifty thousand) "}]}]}], "detailedDescription_md": "Special provisions have been enshrined in the Constitution for the welfare of SC / ST people in every sphere of their life. There are a number of SC / ST people suffering from cancer and other malignant diseases who are unable to carry forward the treatment of their diseases due to the economic hardships faced by them. The government has decided to bring some help to such patients by making available some financial assistance in the form of grants in Aid to SC/ST patients suffering from cancer and other malignant diseases.
caption: Poster 1/4 – Benefits (numbers verified)

ctu_text: "}, "applicationProcess": [{"mode": "Offline", "url": "", "process": [{"type": "ul_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Collect your application form from the concerned department. Applications may be made online as and when the Official Website of the Directorate of Welfare of Scheduled Castes, Assam, / Directorate of Welfare of Plain Tribe and Backward Classes, Assam starts to be fully functional. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Applicants should apply as per the eligibility criteria. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Attach all the required documents and submit the form.
